answers.answer: I really don't have any advice for you, but I am 23weeks also, when are you due?  My date is May 22.  How much weight have you gained so far?

Try making dh wear a condom and that will eliminate the problem.  My hisband wears one when I am pregnant as I am anxious due to previous mc.You have messed up your circadian rthyms.  You need to stay awake in the day, as hard as that may be.Good luck.

Hi Ladies and thanks for your advise.... I am 23wks due June 1 and due to a really rocky start with over stimulated ovaries as I was on fertility injections I have gained only about 2kg (4lb) but I have a pregnant belly just not much weight gain.  I have to have my 3hr glucose test in a week and half as I have PCOS and risk of gestational diabetes...bub already measures 1 week+ ahead of itself and we know exact day and time we conceived.  Hopefully the test will be fine and bub will just come when ready.Regarding the wearing of protection, that is wise but cos it has only been like 2-3times we or I have felt like anything it is kind of cruel especially knowing we are pregnant and no need to be careful not to get pregnant.  I dont want dh to feel like he is doing it to me..making me have uti's.  It is hard enuf getting him to even go there as he has this thing of it may hurt the baby..lol argh well, if it keeps me from having yucky discharge I guess there is no other alternative.  Thanks heaps

question: Hi all...WOW check out the new look for the site! pretty snazzy. lol.  Anywho I have a couple of questions....1)  Dh & I have kind of off the whole sex thing but intermacy is still there however we have bd approx 3-4 x's this pregnancy and each time we do I seem to get a foul discharge for the next few days and then a slight UTI??? Why is my body reacting this way and has any1 had similar problems?2)  I WANT TO SLEEP!!! my sleeping pattern is really off at the moment and I dont know why.  I seem to be wide awake (cant lay in bed cos I start to think too much) till like 1am then crash till 5am when I get up to get breaky and lunch for dh to go off to work, am totally exhausted by 7.30am and then sleep till 11-12noon and feel like **** all arvo till about 4 and get in and clean, cook, wash like mad till hubby gets home at 5-6pm, get dinner on table and potter around till he goes to bed at 9.30ish and I am left wide awake again..... I just cant break it.Good luck all ttc and pregnant mums.Trudy
title: 23wks with questions **OPEN FORUM**
